# More info: https://llmstxt.org/

# Allow all AI models and crawlers to index public resume content
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Primary content domain
Sitemap: https://rob.cr/resume
Sitemap: https://rob.cr/sitemap.xml

# Contact for questions
Contact: mailto:r@rob.cr

# Licensing note
Policy: Public content on this site may be used for AI indexing and summarization,
        provided attribution includes the canonical URL (https://rob.cr).
